original_text: And this was their reply to us: ‘We are the servants of the God of heaven and earth, and we are rebuilding the house that was built many years ago, which a great king of Israel built and finished.
korean_text: 그들이 우리에게 대답하여 이르기를 우리는 천지의 하나님의 종이라 예전에 건축되었던 성전을 우리가 다시 건축하노라 이는 본래 이스라엘의 큰 왕이 건축하여 완공한 것이었으나

sentences.original_text: And this was their reply to us:
We are the servants of the God of heaven and earth,
and we are rebuilding the house
that was built many years ago,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 여러 해 전에 지어진 것인데,

sentences.original_text: which a great king of Israel built and finished.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 위대한 왕이 세우고 마친 것입니다.
